page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Employment is varied. There are 30 farmers & partners, some of whom take on contract work. There are 6 farm workers, 7 building workers, 5 craftsmen, 3 bank clerks, 2 office workers,3 with insurance companies,2 in catering, 3 shopkeepers-one of whom is also the publican and subpostmaster,2 shop assistants,3 salesmen, 3 lorry drivers,2 motor mechanics and 1 electrician. There are also 2 furniture restorers-one also a clockmaker,6 teachers,2 nurses, a vicar,a sculptor,an artist,an actor,his agent,a draftsmen,a photographer and a manufacturer of cider & apple juice with 2 assistants. 50 people are retired, 9 unemployed. In season there are part-time workers, mostly women for apple picking,sprout stripping & turkey plucking. Some retired men do gardening & odd jobs.
